title: Arkansas Post National Memorial: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       To schedule a field trip or professional development training please contact Park Ranger Joe Herron at 870-548-2207 or e-mail us Teacher Ranger Teacher applications are due May 11, 2015. Park Housing is not available for Teacher Rangers.  2015 TRT Application (pdf) 2015 TRT Application (MS Word) The following lesson plans were developed in 2013 and 2014 as part of the Teacher Ranger Teacher program: The Battle of Arkansas Post: Stepping Stone to Vicksburg The Battle of Arkansas Post: Stepping Stone to Vicksburg (small) The Way of the Oh-gah-pah
